00229     /*=============================================================================
00230      * makeObjectFromFile creates an OpenSim object based on the tag at the root
00231      * node of the XML file passed in. This is useful since the constructor of Object 
00232      * doesn't have the proper type info. This works by using the defaults table so 
00233      * that "Object" does not need to know about 
00234      * derived classes. It uses the defaults table to get an instance.
00235      * =============================================================================*/
00236     static Object* makeObjectFromFile(const std::string &aFileName);
00237 
00238     /*=============================================================================
00239      * newInstanceOfType Creates a new instance of the type indicated by aType. 
00240      * The instance is initialized to the default Object
00241      * of corresponding type.
00242      =============================================================================*/
00243     static Object* newInstanceOfType(const std::string &aType);

00245     /*=============================================================================
00246     * getRegisteredTypenames is a utility to retrieve all the typenames registered so far.
00247     * This is done by traversing the registered objects map, so only concrete classes that 
00248     * have registered instances are dealt with.
00249     * The result returned in rTypeNames should not be cached while more dlls are loaded 
00250     * as they get stale
00251     * instead the list should be constructed whenever in doubt
00252     =============================================================================*/
00253     static void getRegisteredTypenames(Array<std::string>& rTypeNames);

00289     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00290     // Observable Interface
00291     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00292     // Manage Observers
00293     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00294     void addObserver(Object& aObserver)
00295     {
00296         if (!_observable)
00297             _observable = new Observable(*this);    // Lazy creation of observable
00298         assert(_observable);
00299         _observable->addObserver(aObserver);
00300     };
00301     void deleteObserver(Object& aObserver)
00302     {
00303         assert(_observable);
00304         _observable->deleteObserver(aObserver);
00305     };
00310     void addObserverEvent(Object& aObserver, Event& aEvent)
00311     {};
00312     void notifyObservers(Event& aEvent)
00313     {
00314         if (!_observable)   // No observer has been added
00315             return;
00316         assert(_observable);
00317         _observable->notifyObservers(aEvent);
00318     };
00319 
00320     void deleteObservers()
00321     {
00322         assert(_observable);
00323         _observable->deleteObservers();
00324     };
00325     int countObservers() const
00326     {
00327         if (!_observable)   // No observer has been added
00328             return 0;       
00329         assert(_observable);
00330         return _observable->countObservers();
00331     };
00332 protected:
00333     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00334     // Manage _changed flag
00335     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00336     void setChanged()
00337     {
00338         if (!_observable)   // No observer has been added
00339             return;     
00340         assert(_observable);
00341         _observable->setChanged();
00342     };
00343     void clearChanged()
00344     {
00345         if (!_observable)   // No observer has been added
00346             return;     
00347         assert(_observable);
00348         _observable->clearChanged();
00349     };
00350     bool hasChanged()
00351     {
00352         if (!_observable)   // No observer has been added
00353             return false;       
00354         assert(_observable);
00355         return (_observable->hasChanged());
00356     };
00357 public:
00358     virtual void update(const Object& aObject, Event& aEvent) {};
00359     /* Static functions to specify and query if all registered objects are written 
00360      * to the defaults section of output files rather than only those 
00361      * explicitly specified by the user in input files */
00362     static void setSerializeAllDefaults(bool aBoolean)
00363     {
00364         _serializeAllDefaults = aBoolean;
00365     }
00366     static bool getSerializeAllDefaults()
00367     {
00368         return _serializeAllDefaults;
00369     }
00370 public: 
00371     static bool isKindOf(const char *type) 
00372     { 
00373         return (strcmp("Object",type)==0);
00374     } 
00375     virtual bool isA(const char *type) const
00376     { 
00377         return this->isKindOf(type); 
00378     } 
00379 
00380     template<class T> static void getRegisteredObjectsOfGivenType(ArrayPtrs<T> &rArray) {
00381         rArray.setSize(0);
00382         rArray.setMemoryOwner(false);
00383         for(int i=0; i<_Types.getSize(); i++)
00384             if(dynamic_cast<T*>(_Types[i]))
00385                 rArray.append(dynamic_cast<T*>(_Types[i]));
00386     }

00395 #define OPENSIM_DECLARE_DERIVED(thisClass,parentclass) \
00396     typedef parentclass Parent; \
00397   public: \
00398   static bool isKindOf(const char *type) \
00399   { \
00400     if (strcmp(#thisClass,type)==0) \
00401       { \
00402       return true; \
00403       } \
00404     return Parent::isKindOf(type); \
00405   } \
00406   virtual bool isA(const char *type) const \
00407   { \
00408     return this->thisClass::isKindOf(type); \
00409   } \
00410   static thisClass* safeDownCast(OpenSim::Object *obj) \
00411   { \
00412       return dynamic_cast<thisClass *>(obj); \
00413   } \
00414   virtual void copy(const Object &aObject) \
00415   { \
00416       if (aObject.isA(#thisClass)) { \
00417           *this = *((const thisClass*)(&aObject)); \
00418      } else { \
00419       throw Exception(std::string(#thisClass)+"::copy() called with object (name = "+ \
00420               aObject.getName()+", type = "+aObject.getType()+").", \
00421               __FILE__,__LINE__); \
00422      } \
00423   }
